ComicInfo.Summary:
Strontium Dog returns this prog for its second story in 2000AD (and it takes the colour centrespread). This issue also sees Ron Smith's first work on Judge Dredd.
Cover: Carlos Ezquerra (Strontium Dog)
Judge Dredd - The Day the Law Died (part 16) (John Wagner - Ron Smith - Tom Frame)Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter - Verdus (part 14) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson - Steve Potter)Strontium Dog - Journey into Hell (part 1) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezqerra - John Aldrich)Dan Dare - Servant of Evil! (part 5) (Tom Tully - Dave Gibbons)Ro-Busters - The Fall and Rise of Ro-Jaws and Hammerstein! (part 2) (Pat Mills - Kevin O'Neill - Peter Knight)2000AD Star Pin-Up - Dan Dare (art: Dave Gibbons)
